summary: A medium to large Windhelm style house with all necessities located southwest of Windhelm near Mara\'s Eye Pond.
descriptionHtml:
Update-Added a new file with all new textures for the interior part of the house.  There are two files that can be downloaded.  One is with original Windhelm style textures and the other one is with all new textures, your choice.  You need to download only one file.


[b]Stony Ridge[/b] is a medium to full size player home with all the essentials you need to store your items and show off your favorite armor.  [b]Around level 30 or more is recommended to obtain the house.[/b]  Home has a gorgeous view of the mountains and located southwest of Windhelm near Mara\'s Eye Pond.  

In E201, an alchemist named Satyr was very much into his work.  He devoted his life to find the perfect potion that would make a name for himself.  Unfortunately, that came with a huge price.  He lost his wife, his two kids, and more importantly his humanity.  

[b][color=yellow]Features[/color][/b]
-100% non respawning storage containers
-100% Nav-meshed 
-12 mannequins
-30+ weapon holders
-4 shield plaques
-4 dagger cases
-Plenty of space for all your books
-Dragon priest mask holders
-Alchemy and enchanting room with plenty of storage
-Full forge area in basement
-All 10 shrines are available and with easy access

[color=red]Comments and suggestions are welcomed.  If you like the file please endorse.  Thank you.[/color]

[color=yellow]Conflicts[/color]
No conflict with any other mods, just ones that alter the same cells.

[color=yellow]Instal/Uninstall[/color]
Using Nexus Mod Manager is the easiest way or put file in Data folder located in your Steam directory.

[color=yellow]Versions[/color]
1.4--Uploaded textured version again. File had missing textures/meshes in Riften Jail.
1.3-Added new file for all new textures for interior part of cell.  Also added some unique decorations and stable. 
1.2-Fixed nav-mesh where followers would get stuck, added storage, tweaked lighting, and added a little more decoration
1.1-Added decorations
1.0-Main File

Thanks goes out to Bethesda for an awesome game and to Nexus Mod Manager for letting the public have options to make the game even better.  Also, thanks to my husband for his help and putting up with my aggravation when things weren\'t going so well.
author: Janisa
